alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:03PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tooele County through 630 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Clive, or 34 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clive. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 45 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
